translation.en: [man sighs] Okay, here we go. I think it's all set.
translation.zh: ‎好 我看看啊 应该开录了

translation.en: -[man] Love it! -[woman] Want me to do it?
translation.zh:
‎-喜欢极了！来 你来拍
‎-我来吗？

translation.en: [woman] Teddy, you like your new fire truck?
Look at the camera. Look and say, "Hi, Mom."
translation.zh: ‎快看镜头 说“嗨 妈咪！”

translation.en: Well, look at her and say it.
-Oh, be careful, honey. -[Dad] Get the camera.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 小心点 亲爱的
‎-你来拍吧

translation.en: Look at this, huh! It's your sister.
Katie Cat! That's good, dude. Gimme some.
translation.zh: ‎凯特猫 真妙 来击个掌

translation.en: Merry Christmas 2008! Santa got Teddy a bike!
translation.zh:
‎2008年圣诞快乐！
‎圣诞老人送给泰迪一辆自行车！
‎圣诞老人送给泰迪一辆自行车！

translation.en: -All right, wave to Mom. Say "Hi, Mom." -Hi, Mom!
translation.zh:
‎-来 给妈妈挥挥手 说“嗨 妈妈”
‎-嗨 妈妈！

‎-谢谢你 圣诞老人
‎-谢谢你 圣诞老人

translation.en: It's Christmas 2011! Whoo! What did we get?
translation.zh:
‎现在是2011年的圣诞节！
‎都有什么礼物呢？

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! What are you doing, you guys? Come on!
translation.zh: ‎喂！你们俩干什么呢？不许这样！

translation.en: All right? What-- What do we do? We...
translation.zh: ‎好 我们应该怎么做？我们…

‎-抱一抱 和好了
‎-抱一抱 和好了

‎-嘿 你们三个！
‎-嘿 快过来 快看！

translation.en: Okay, so most people don't know this, but reindeer love candy canes. Watch.
translation.zh:
‎大多数人都不知道驯鹿喜欢吃拐杖糖
‎你们看好了

‎-你好呀
‎-亲爱的 这是真的吗？

translation.en: -I want a reindeer! -[Mom] You want a reindeer?
[Dad] Oh, really? Where are we gonna keep this reindeer?
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？我们哪里有地方养驯鹿？
‎-养条鱼怎么样？

translation.en: -How about a fish? You want a fish? -[Dad] No, let's go with the reindeer.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？我们哪里有地方养驯鹿？
‎-养条鱼怎么样？ ‎-是吧 一条鱼…
‎-还是不了 还不如驯鹿呢

translation.en: -[Mom] Look, look! She's eating it! -[Kate] So cool!
-Merry Christmas from the Pierce family! -[Dad] ♪ Merry Christmas! ♪
translation.zh: ‎来自皮尔斯全家的圣诞祝福！ ‎圣诞快乐！

translation.en: Teddy is about to open his present from Daddy.
translation.zh: ‎泰迪马上就要拆开爹地送的礼物了

translation.en: -Mommy doesn't really approve, okay. -This is a big one! [clears throat]
translation.zh:
‎-妈咪并不觉得这是个好主意哦
‎-这个礼物很重要

translation.en: -So cool. A knife. -[Mom chuckles] What's it say?
translation.zh:
‎-好酷哦！是一把刀！
‎-上面写了什么？

translation.en: -"A Pierce always sees it through." -That's right.
translation.zh:
‎-“皮尔斯家的人总是坚持到底”
‎-没错

translation.en: -Everyone get together. -A picture. All right, guys.
translation.zh: ‎大家靠拢点 来张合影！准备

translation.en: [sighs] Dear Santa, this is Kate Pierce.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的圣诞老人 我是凯特皮尔斯

‎我家住在马萨诸塞州洛威尔
‎布里奇顿路18号

translation.en: Just wanted to say that I've been really good this year.
I know I haven't been doing too well in school,
especially since I got a D minus in Spanish.
I have a really hard time with languages.
But I promise to get my grades up in the new year.
translation.zh:
‎但是我向你保证
‎在新的一年里提高成绩

translation.en: I help out Mom a lot. She has to work at the hospital most nights,
translation.zh:
‎我经常帮妈妈做家务
‎她几乎每个晚上都在医院上班

translation.en: so I start dinner three, four times a week,
translation.zh: ‎所以每周有三四天都是我做晚饭

translation.en: do the dishes, and take out the trash.
And I try not to get into too much trouble.
I do say bad words every now and then,
but that's only when my brother, Teddy, makes fun of me and I lose my sh--
translation.zh:
‎但只是在我哥哥泰迪取笑我
‎把我惹毛…

translation.en: Anyway, Santa, I'm not asking for much this Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎总之 圣诞老人 我今年的要求不多
‎只要一个白骨队的滑板就好

translation.en: You know, the red one with the skeleton on it?
translation.zh: ‎就是红色的 上面有骷髅头的那个？

translation.en: My brother, Teddy, won't even let me touch his.
translation.zh: ‎我哥哥泰迪连碰都不让我碰他的滑板

translation.en: [Kate] I wouldn't waste my time getting him any presents.
translation.zh: ‎我要是你 就不会为他的礼物费心了

translation.en: He's turning into a real loser-- Ow! Teddy, what the hell?
translation.zh: ‎他正在变成一个不折不扣的窝囊废… ‎好痛！泰迪 你在搞什么？

translation.en: -Talking smack about me? -[Kate] Let go! You're gonna break it!
translation.zh:
‎-你敢说我坏话？
‎-给我！不然弄坏了！

translation.en: Who cares? This camera's like 20 years old.
translation.zh:
‎那有怎样？
‎这都是二十多年的老摄像机了

translation.en: If it's good enough for Dad, it's good enough for me. Now, give it back!
translation.zh:
‎我不管 爸爸用过的就是最好的
‎快还给我！

translation.en: I can't believe you're still making video letters to Santa.
translation.zh: ‎我不敢相信你还在给圣诞老人录视频

‎-你都十岁了 马上就十一岁了
‎-那又怎样？

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, you really have no clue, do you?
chance that he's gonna watch a video.
He only reads handwritten letters sent in the mail.
-[laughs] What? -You can't leave me alone in the house.
translation.zh: ‎什么？ ‎你不能留我一个人在家

translation.en: Don't worry, guys! Everything's gonna be okay!
translation.zh: ‎你们别担心 一切都会没事的

translation.en: -[boy 2] Not too bad, man. -[boy] Let's get outta here.
You have a good time with your friends?
Get outta my room. You're not allowed in here.
translation.zh: ‎给我出去 你知道你不能进我房间的

translation.en: And you're not allowed to steal cars from the deli parking lot.
translation.zh: ‎你也不该从熟食店的停车场偷车

translation.en: -I didn't steal a car. -I saw the whole thing.
When Mom sees this, she's gonna freak out!
translation.zh: ‎妈妈要是看见了 她准会疯掉的！

translation.en: She's so sick of your crap, I bet she turns you in to the cops herself!
translation.zh:
‎她早受够你干的破事儿了
‎她肯定会亲自去警察局告发你！

translation.en: Gimme that tape, you little creep!
-[Teddy] Gimme that now! Come on! -No! -Gimme it! -[both grunting]
translation.zh:
‎-现在就把带子给我！快点！
‎-不给！

translation.en: -Ow! Stop! It's mine! -[Teddy] Come on, stop being such a baby!
translation.zh:
‎-好痛！泰迪 快住手 那是我的！
‎-你别给我使性子！

translation.en: -[Kate] Stop! -What the hell is going on?
Is this what happens when I leave?
translation.zh:
‎我不在家的时候
‎你们就是这个样子的吗？

translation.en: He did something really horrible, and I have proof! [pants]
translation.zh: ‎他做了一件非常糟糕的事 我有证据
‎快说啊 凯特！我还等着呢！

translation.en: He shoved me against the wall, into this picture.
translation.zh: ‎他把我猛推到墙上 把照片撞坏了

translation.en: [tearfully] You know what I want for Christmas?
translation.zh: ‎你们知道我的圣诞愿望是什么吗？

translation.en: I want for the two of you to get along.
You're her older brother. I expect more from you.
translation.zh: ‎你是哥哥 你理应做得更好的

translation.en: Teddy, please put the tree back up.
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 快去把圣诞树扶起来

translation.en: And put the lights on, while you're at it. I've only been asking you all week!
translation.zh:
‎再顺便把彩灯挂上去
‎这事儿我都说了一个礼拜了！

translation.en: Come on, you guys! Dad would've had this place looking--
translation.zh:
‎你们争点气吧！
‎要是爸爸还活着 这地方会…

translation.en: Kate, help me unload the groceries.
translation.zh: ‎凯特 ‎帮我归置从超市买的东西

translation.en: [chuckling] This does not look like a Christmas tree. It looks like--
translation.zh: ‎这一点都不像圣诞树 更像…

translation.en: Whoa, whoa! You want some cookie with those sprinkles? Golly!
translation.zh: ‎喂！你这糖粒撒得连饼干都看不见了 ‎我的天啊
‎我不是有意的 ‎没事的 亲爱的

translation.en: -Thanks. -I think they should all be like that.
[sighs] Isn't there someone else that can...

translation.zh: ‎哦 天啊 那太糟糕了

translation.en: Yeah, no, of course. I'll-- I'll be right there.
-I don't want to. -[Kate] But it's Christmas Eve!
translation.zh:
‎-我也不愿意啊
‎-今晚可是圣诞前夜啊

translation.en: Well, even more reason for me to be at the hospital, honey.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才更需要去医院值班啊 乖乖

translation.en: Some people have no one else to take care of them.
But there's still so much to do.
translation.zh: ‎但我们还有好多圣诞活动没做完呢

translation.en: We have to hang the stockings and make the eggnog!
translation.zh: ‎我们得把圣诞袜挂上 还要做甜蛋酒

translation.en: -It just won't be Christmas without it! -[Mom] Oh, honey.
translation.zh:
‎-不然就不是圣诞节了
‎-哦 亲爱的

translation.en: There is more to Christmas than all that stuff.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节并不是只有这些仪式而已

translation.en: I'm gonna pretend like I didn't hear that, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎我姑且装作没听见你刚讲的话 妈妈

translation.en: -[Mom] Where? -Me and my friends are going caroling.
translation.zh:
‎-去哪里？
‎-我和几个朋友要去唱圣诞颂歌

translation.en: You haven't been caroling since you were in kindergarten, and you hated it.
translation.zh:
‎你打从幼儿园之后就没去唱过颂歌了
‎你很讨厌这件事的

translation.en: Just wanna spread a little Christmas cheer.
translation.zh: ‎我就是想散播一下圣诞节的喜悦嘛

translation.en: Okay, well, you can't go, 'cause I need to work.
translation.zh: ‎行了 你不能出去 因为我得去上班

translation.en: Which is why you're gonna stay home with your sister.
translation.zh: ‎所以你应该留在家里陪你妹妹啊

‎-别这样啊 妈 我…
‎-没得商量

translation.en: You are not to leave this house, young man!
translation.zh: ‎我不准你出这个家 小子

translation.en: You leave her alone again, and you are grounded!
translation.zh: ‎你再丢下她一个人 你会被禁足的

translation.en: Take the cookies out in 20 minutes, all right?
translation.zh:
‎二十分钟后把饼干拿出来
‎知道了吗？

translation.en: And don't stay up too late. And no soda! [smooches]
translation.zh: ‎不要睡太晚 不准喝汽水

translation.en: And listen, absolutely no junk food, okay?
translation.zh:
‎还有 绝对不准吃垃圾食品
‎记住了吗？

translation.en: See you guys tomorrow, bright and early.
Wanna watch a movie? Mom's gone, so it can be PG-13 or maybe even R!
translation.zh:
‎想看电影吗？妈妈不在家
‎我们可以看辅导级甚至是限制级的！

translation.en: -I'm gonna go to my room. -But it's Christmas Eve!
translation.zh:
‎-我回房间了
‎-可今天是圣诞前夜啊

translation.en: I told you to stop calling me that.
You used to laugh when I called you Teddy Bear,
translation.zh: ‎以前我叫你泰迪熊的时候你都会大笑

translation.en: and I was your Katie Cat.
all you wanna do is hang out with your wannabe gangster friends.
translation.zh: ‎你成天只知道和那些小混混在一起

translation.en: You know... at least they're fun.
They're not boring slugs like you.
translation.zh: ‎不像你这种无聊鬼那么无趣

translation.en: -[Dad] Mm, cookies. -[Mom] No! You've had enough, mister!
translation.zh:
‎-饼干
‎-不行！你吃得够多了 这位先生！

translation.en: [Dad] Is there any chance I can open a Christmas present early?
translation.zh: ‎我能不能提早拆一件圣诞礼物？

translation.en: [chuckles] No, we have way too much to do.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我们还要好多事要做呢

translation.en: -[Dad] What is this? What is this? -[Mom] What are you doing?
-I know. -[Dad] I think I like it.
[Mom sighs] Where are you going? Wait. Honey... [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree O Christmas tree... ♪
translation.zh:
‎-等等 你要干嘛 亲爱的…
‎-哦 圣诞树…

translation.en: [Mom whispers] You're gonna wake up the kids! -[Mom screams, laughs] -[Dad] ♪ Don't care if the kids wake up ♪
translation.zh:
‎-你会吵醒孩子们的！
‎-就算孩子们被吵醒我也不管…

translation.en: [Mom] Seriously? -[Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree ♪ -[Mom] Shh! [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree ♪
-[Dad] ♪ ...up ♪ -[Mom] Seriously? Shh! [Dad] ♪ O Christmas tree O Christmas tree ♪
Teddy, get down here! You've gotta see this!
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 快下来！你必须看看这个！

translation.en: -[Kate] You know who that looks like. -[Teddy] Aunt Peggy.
translation.zh: ‎你知道那看起来像谁吧 ‎佩吉姨妈

translation.en: No way. That person isn't wearing an ugly Christmas sweater.
translation.zh:
‎不可能 画面上那人
‎没有穿搞怪的圣诞毛衣

‎再说了 佩吉姨妈从来没有
‎在圣诞前夜来我们家

translation.en: Aunt Peggy's never here on Christmas Eve. And if she was,
translation.zh:
‎再说了 佩吉姨妈从来没有
‎在圣诞前夜来我们家 ‎就算她有 爸爸妈妈怎么可能把她
‎独自一人留在客厅呢？

translation.en: why would Mom and Dad leave her alone in the living room
translation.zh:
‎就算她有 爸爸妈妈怎么可能把她
‎独自一人留在客厅呢？

translation.en: in the dark? Maybe it was a burglar.
translation.zh:
‎-还黑灯瞎火的
‎-也许是个窃贼吧

translation.en: would've had to been standing flat up against the wall like this, next to the--
translation.zh:
‎这个人必须得像这样紧贴着墙面
‎挨着…

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! The fireplace! I just got goosebumps!
translation.zh: ‎天啊！是壁炉！我都起鸡皮疙瘩了！

translation.en: -Come on, Teddy. You know it's him. -Kate...
translation.zh:
‎-哎呀 泰迪 你知道一定是他
‎-凯特

translation.en: Hey, we should make a video!
Tonight! Maybe we can get a shot of the whole Santa Claus, and not just his hand!
translation.zh:
‎就今晚！没准我们可以拍下
‎圣诞老人的全身 而不只有手而已！

translation.en: You don't think anyone's thought of that before? Catching Santa in the act?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得这主意以前没人想过吗？
‎把圣诞老人抓个现行？

translation.en: Yeah, but have you ever heard of anyone actually pulling it off?
translation.zh:
‎就算有人这么想的话
‎你有听说过有人成功吗？

translation.en: No! They probably don't think it's possible. But it is!
translation.zh:
‎没有！也许他们以为这不可能做到
‎但这是有可能的！

‎这就是证据！
‎一个记录他派送礼物全程的视频

translation.en: A video showing exactly how he does it. It's gonna get a gazillion hits.
translation.zh:
‎这就是证据！
‎一个记录他派送礼物全程的视频 ‎点击率将是个天文数字

translation.en: Please? Mom always says we should be helping each other out.
translation.zh: ‎求你了 妈妈总说我们应该互帮互助

translation.en: I don't think this is what she had in mind.
translation.zh: ‎是没错 但她指的应该不是这种事

translation.en: Look! I'll give you back the tape of you in the car.
translation.zh: ‎这样吧！我会把你偷车的录影带给你

translation.en: And you can never say anything to Mom about it.
I saw it on Ghost Adventurers.
-Hey! Mom said no junk food! -Yeah, well, we gotta stay up somehow.
translation.zh:
‎-喂 妈妈说了不许吃垃圾食品
‎-嗯 要熬夜的话总得干点什么吧

translation.en: sometimes, you gotta break the rules for the greater good.
translation.zh: ‎有时候 为成大事 就是要破些例才行

translation.en: Can't even remember the last time we did anything together, Teddy.
translation.zh:
‎我都不记得上次我们一起做点事
‎是什么时候了 泰迪

translation.en: Just the two of us! Pulling an all-nighter!
-[Teddy] What the-- -He's on the roof, let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么…
‎-他在房顶上 我们走！

translation.en: -He's at the back of the house! -Get your coat!
translation.zh:
‎-他在屋子后面！
‎-把你的外套穿上！

translation.en: [Teddy] Did you see that? It's Santa Claus!
We'll get a better view from the alley!
translation.zh: ‎我们去巷子那儿会看得更清楚！

translation.en: It's more beautiful than I ever imagined. [sighs]
Do you realize how big of a deal this is? I need to get a closer look.
translation.zh:
‎你知道这是多么重大的一件事吗？
‎我要凑近看仔细点！

translation.en: -Get down. -No way. Hand me the camera.
translation.zh:
‎-快下来！
‎-不可能的事 把摄像机给我

translation.en: Be careful. You break your neck, and Mom will kill me.
translation.zh:
‎小心啊 你受伤了的话
‎妈妈非宰了我不可

translation.en: I wanted to get a closer look at the sleigh.
-Did he see us? -I don't think so.
translation.zh:
‎-他有看见我们吗？
‎-应该没有吧

translation.en: We got enough footage. Let's get outta here.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经拍下足够的镜头了 该走了

translation.en: -Why don't we just stay here? -Stay here? In the sleigh?
translation.zh:
‎-不如我们留下吧？
‎-留下？待在雪橇里？

translation.en: Yeah! How many kids get to ride with Santa in his sleigh on Christmas Eve?
translation.zh:
‎对啊 有多少孩子能有机会
‎在圣诞前夜和圣诞老人一起坐雪橇？

translation.en: [whispers] Hang in there. He's gonna go back down again.
translation.zh: ‎坚持住 要不了多久他会重回地面的
‎或许圣诞老人有毯子能借我披一下？

translation.en: -Teddy... -I could have swore I saw Paris!
translation.zh:
‎-泰迪…
‎-我发誓我刚看到巴黎了！

‎-泰迪？
‎-那飞机差点就让我们丧命了！

translation.en: Why? Because I'm not a big fat slob?
translation.zh:
‎为什么？
‎因为我不是又大又肥的邋遢鬼吗？

translation.en: No, no. I-- I didn't mean it that way.
Ah, that's okay, Kate. I guess it's understandable.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 凯特 我可以理解

translation.en: I mean, who can eat millions of cookies in one night and not get fat, right?
translation.zh:
‎一晚上就吃几百万个饼干的人
‎怎么可能不胖呢 对吧？

translation.en: I don't go, "Ho ho ho." That's a myth.
translation.zh: ‎我才不说“吼吼吼”呢 那纯属虚构

translation.en: You two have really messed things up.
You were supposed to be asleep.
What did you do with my sack of presents?
We came back over Moscow and...
translation.zh: ‎我们从莫斯科飞过来 然后…

translation.en: Reindeer must've broken off somewhere over Lakeshore Drive.
translation.zh: ‎驯鹿们一定是在湖滨大道附近脱缰的
‎我们现在在芝加哥呢 小姑娘

translation.en: That means we traveled thousands of miles in, like, 30 seconds.
translation.zh:
‎也就是说我们在短短30秒之内
‎就穿越了好几千公里

‎-无与伦比！
‎-你是说无与伦比的灾难吧

translation.en: If I'm not up and running in the next couple of hours,
translation.zh: ‎要是我不在几个小时内重新出发的话

translation.en: half the continent's not gonna get presents, and that,
translation.zh: ‎北美洲将有一半无法收到礼物 那…

translation.en: Uh, so a few brats don't get presents. It's not the end of the world.
translation.zh:
‎大不了就是几个淘气鬼没礼物嘛
‎又不是世界末日

translation.en: That's just the kinda lame garbage I'd expect from a Lost Believer.
translation.zh:
‎像你这样的失去信仰者
‎也难怪会说出这么一无是处的废话

translation.en: You listen to me, Teddy Pierce.
young boys and girls all over the globe are waiting, hoping,
translation.zh:
‎全球的小男孩小女孩 ‎都在等待、希望、期盼着
‎圣诞老人的到来

‎都在等待、希望、期盼着
‎圣诞老人的到来

translation.en: Well, you don't wanna know what happened the last time I couldn't make my rounds.
translation.zh:
‎哎 别提我上次没法赶到所有地方时
‎情况有多糟糕了

translation.en: You've heard of the Dark Ages?
translation.zh: ‎你们有听说过欧洲的黑暗中世纪

translation.en: Read about all those wars in school?
translation.zh: ‎在学校学过两次世界大战的事情

translation.en: Wait, those happened because you missed Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎等等 发生那些事情
‎是因为没有过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: Christmas spirit is more powerful than you could ever imagine.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞精神的力量
‎远比你想象的要强大得多

translation.en: People need Christmas to remind themselves of how good they can be!
translation.zh:
‎人们需要圣诞节
‎来唤醒心中所有的良善
‎否则… ‎总之 我们必须将圣诞节进行到底！
‎总之 我们必须将圣诞节进行到底！

translation.en: All right, I need to round up the reindeer,
translation.zh: ‎好了 我得把我的驯鹿找回来

translation.en: call the elves, and maybe, just maybe, I can still save Christmas. [grunts]
translation.zh:
‎给精灵们联系
‎说不定我还能拯救圣诞节

translation.en: The closer you get, the faster it chimes.
translation.zh: ‎离礼物袋越近 铃声的频率就越快

translation.en: At least it's not that far away. [sighs]
Oh no, no, no, no, no, no, no!
Oh, that-- that won't help. Your hat's not magic.
translation.zh:
‎不 那不顶用的
‎你的帽子又没有魔法

translation.en: Well, how do you think I can turn into coal dust
translation.zh: ‎不然你觉得我怎么能幻化成煤灰

translation.en: and leap from rooftop to rooftop?
translation.zh: ‎从一个房顶跳到另外一个房顶的？

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe this! She told me,
translation.zh: ‎我无法相信这一切！她总告诉我

translation.en: "You should always bring a spare, Nick!"
translation.zh: ‎“尼克 你应该随时把备用帽子带上”

translation.en: Well... I guess I'm gonna have to do this the old-fashioned way.
translation.zh: ‎哎 看来我得使用原始方法了

translation.en: Santa, just let us help you!
translation.zh: ‎圣诞老人 让我们帮你吧！

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. I think you've done quite enough damage already, don't you?
translation.zh:
‎还是算了
‎你们闯的祸已经够大了 不是吗？

translation.en: No, you just go on back to your house and get some sleep.
No need to wake up early.
[scoffs] You two are on the naughty list for life.
translation.zh: ‎你俩这辈子都会在调皮鬼名单上了！

translation.en: We can't just stay here! Santa needs us!
translation.zh:
‎我们不能就这么傻站着！
‎圣诞老人需要我们！

translation.en: I don't know. He seems pretty mad.
We're, like, a thousand miles away!
Teddy, you heard him. We're on the naughty list for life!
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 你刚也听见了 ‎我们这辈子都在调皮鬼名单上！

translation.en: I mean, that's, like, the worst possible thing a kid could ever do!
translation.zh:
‎这可是一个孩子能做的
‎最十恶不赦的事情了！

translation.en: Do you really wanna tell your kids that you were that guy?
The person responsible for the Christmas Meltdown of 2018?
translation.zh:
‎你就是2018年圣诞大灾难的
‎始作俑者吗？

translation.en: Ah, well, I can't do anything to stop you.
You better watch out, you better not pout, and you better not cry.
translation.zh: ‎你们最好小心 ‎不要噘嘴生气 ‎你们最好不要哭

translation.en: I don't have time for any more of your shenanigans.
translation.zh: ‎我可没空再理会你们的胡闹了

translation.en: ♪ Here comes Santa Claus Here comes Santa Claus ♪
Uh, I don't think I'm supposed to be in here.
Just stay next to me, but I'll do the talking.
translation.zh: ‎就待在我旁边就好 我来说话

translation.en: -How do you know my name? -[chuckles] You got so big!
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么知道我叫什么？
‎-你都长这么大了！

translation.en: Ah, you know what I mean. Grown-up big!
translation.zh: ‎别误会 我是说长大成人的意思

translation.en: Now, do you remember that letter you sent me about dreaming of being a fashion designer?
translation.zh:
‎你还记得你曾写信告诉我
‎你梦想成为一名服装设计师吗？

translation.en: She used to always ask for sewing kits,
translation.zh: ‎她以前总要求收到缝纫套组

translation.en: I think it was 2009 when you made all the stockings by yourself.
translation.zh:
‎我记得好像2009年吧
‎你亲自缝制了家里所有的圣诞袜呢

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry the fashion designer thing didn't quite pan out.
translation.zh: ‎很遗憾你没能实现服装设计师的梦想

translation.en: Yeah, I wanted to go to Parsons and live in New York,
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我想上帕森斯设计学院
‎去纽约居住

translation.en: but I couldn't afford the tuition.
Is this some kind of reality show? How do you know all that stuff?
translation.zh:
‎你们是在拍什么真人秀吗？
‎你是怎么知道这些事情的？

translation.en: Did you talk to my mom?
Oh, no, no, no. I certainly wouldn't ruin the surprise
translation.zh:
‎没有 ‎我可不想毁掉
‎你为她织的漂亮围巾的惊喜

translation.en: of that beautiful scarf you made for your mom.
translation.zh:
‎我可不想毁掉
‎你为她织的漂亮围巾的惊喜

translation.en: -Wendy, we've got a big problem. -[laughs] We need a ride into the city.
translation.zh:
‎是这样的 温蒂 我们有大麻烦了
‎我们需要搭个顺风车进城

translation.en: Oh, I don't have a car. Can you call an Uber?
translation.zh: ‎哦 我没有车 你能叫一辆优步吗？

translation.en: Oh, you guys got any cash on you?
You think I can pay the driver... with these?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我可以用这个支付司机吗？

translation.en: You know what? Um... Here, take my tips.
Um, although I don't think it's enough to cover
-a cab ride-- -That's very kind of you,
translation.zh:
‎-打车进城…
‎-哦 温蒂 你真好心

translation.en: but I'm sure somebody in here will help us out.
translation.zh: ‎不过我相信这里会有人能帮我们的

translation.en: Uh, sorry for the intrusion, folks.
-The real Santa Claus! -Yeah, that's okay, Kate.
translation.zh:
‎-真正的圣诞老人
‎-没事的 凯特

translation.en: -Not just one of those phony mall ones. -I've got this.
translation.zh:
‎-不是商场里哪种假扮的
‎-我来说就好

translation.en: You don't look like Santa Claus.
Yeah, well, billboards add 80 pounds, Freddie.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 ‎哎 广告牌总会让人看起来
‎比实际胖上35公斤 弗雷迪

translation.en: we've got ourselves an emergency situation here.
And if you all want presents under the tree and in your stockings in the morning,
translation.zh:
‎如果你们想明天早上在圣诞树下和
‎圣诞袜里看到礼物

translation.en: who here can give us a ride into the city so I can find my reindeer?
translation.zh:
‎你们之中谁能载我们进城
‎好让我找到我的驯鹿？
‎抱歉 我们没法帮这个忙

translation.en: [in Hindi] You guys have a car you can lend me?
[in English] And I speak English, you moron.
translation.zh: ‎而且我会讲英语 你个白痴

translation.en: Larry, you drove your Porsche here tonight, didn't you?
translation.zh: ‎拉里 你今晚开你的保时捷来的吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -How would you like to trade that Porsche
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-如果你把那保时捷给我
‎米奇曼托新手卡 怎么样？

translation.en: I know you've always wanted one.
-It's a deal. It's a deal. -I thought so.

translation.zh:
‎-去找泊车员就行
‎-什么就成交了？

translation.en: You're not trading our Porsche for a baseball card, Larry!
translation.zh:
‎用我们的保时捷交换一张棒球卡
‎是不可能的 拉里！

translation.en: -Know what that is worth? -What it's worth? Nothing!
translation.zh:
‎-你知道它值多少吗？
‎-你说呢？一文不值！

translation.en: -[Larry and Santa groan] -That's what it's worth!
There is a maniac dressed in a weird Santa costume harassing the customers.
translation.zh:
‎有个穿着奇怪圣诞老人装束的疯子
‎一直在骚扰顾客

translation.en: He's got two kids with him. It could be an AMBER Alert situation.
translation.zh:
‎他还带着两个小孩
‎他们可能是被绑架的

translation.en: -We gotta get out of here. -[Santa] Jeff! I know
translation.zh:
‎我们得马上走 ‎-杰夫 我知道你一直不怎么相信…
‎-行了 抱歉啊 各位

translation.en: -you've had a hard time believ-- -Okay, sorry, folks!
translation.zh:
‎-杰夫 我知道你一直不怎么相信…
‎-行了 抱歉啊 各位

translation.en: -What has gotten into you? -Okay, Santa, let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-你这是怎么了？
‎-好了 圣诞老人 我们快走！

translation.en: Now, old Charlie here is in the Naughty List Hall of Fame!
translation.zh:
‎查理可以说是
‎调皮鬼当中的调皮鬼了

translation.en: Ah, you just got outta the joint again, what, about a month ago, Charlie?
translation.zh:
‎你又被关进去了
‎一个月前才出狱吧 查理？

translation.en: I don't think your parole officer would be too happy
if he knew you'd stolen that red Dodge Challenger a couple of days ago, do you?
translation.zh:
‎你前几天偷了一辆红色的道奇挑战者
‎他恐怕不会很高兴吧

translation.en: Yeah, well, what my parole officer doesn't know won't hurt him.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 只要我的假释官不知道
‎就不会有事

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might not be so lucky!
translation.zh: ‎而你呢 可就没那么走运了！

translation.en: After all, my friend Teddy here is headed down the same path.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我的朋友泰迪正在重蹈你的覆辙

translation.en: I mean, he's still a little young, but...
you keep going, couple years, this could be you.
translation.zh:
‎你再继续惹事的话
‎这就是你几年后的下场

translation.en: Prison tattoos and slinging tequila shots!
translation.zh: ‎浑身监狱刺青 猛灌龙舌兰酒

translation.en: -Okay, that's it! -All right, out! Out, out, out, out! Bye, Wendy!
Let's go! Okay, hold the doors!
Oh no! Christmas spirit's already down 35%.
translation.zh: ‎糟糕 圣诞精神值已经降到35%了

translation.en: We need to get things back on track.
She's our friend and she's crazy!
translation.zh: ‎她是我们的朋友 但她疯了！

translation.en: If you come back here, she'll kill you! You hear me? She'll kill you...
translation.zh:
‎你回来的话她会杀了你的！
‎你听到了吗？她会杀了你…

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Teddy, Teddy, I don't think this is such a good idea.
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 别这样 这样不好

translation.en: Oh, come on! Do you wanna save Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎别管那么多了
‎你要不要拯救圣诞节？

translation.en: Well, not by stealing a car.
Uh, that kinda undermines the whole naughty or nice concept, don't you think?
translation.zh:
‎这样的话
‎还分调皮鬼和乖孩子干什么呢？

translation.en: Don't you break into, like, a billion homes every year?
translation.zh: ‎难道你每年不是四处私闯民宅吗？

translation.en: -I mean, technically, that's illegal, too. -Fair point.
translation.zh: ‎从严格意义上说 那也是非法的 ‎我竟然无力反驳

translation.en: And, plus, it's not just any car.
translation.zh: ‎再说了 这不是我随意挑的一辆车

translation.en: I mean, we're not even breaking the law because...
you know, the car's already stolen.
-And when we're finished, we'll just-- -Turn it in to the police.
translation.zh:
‎-用完之后 我们就…
‎-把它交给警察局

translation.en: All right, now, slow down. Just be cool. Walk regular. Regular.
translation.zh:
‎走慢点 漫不经心一点
‎像平常一样走路 像平常一样

translation.en: Hey, hey, slow down! Slow down! You're not even old enough to drive!
translation.zh:
‎喂 走慢点！
‎你还没到能开车的法定年龄呢！

translation.en: -No, it's not! You stole it! -Get in, get in!
Hey, don't worry, Charlie. I just reported it stolen.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 查理 别担心
‎我刚刚向警方举报 说你的车被偷了

translation.en: No one's following us, so you can slow down.
translation.zh: ‎没人在追我们 你可以开慢点了

translation.en: Oh, come on, I'm not even going that fast!
translation.zh: ‎拜托 我开得根本不算快啊

translation.en: All right, now we're getting somewhere.
translation.zh: ‎好 我们终于有了些进展

translation.en: Uh, Santa, you know that stuff's junk, right?
translation.zh: ‎圣诞老人 你知道那些都是废物吧？

translation.en: Yeah, well, Katie Cat, one man's junk...
translation.zh: ‎知道 不过凯特猫 圣诞老人…

translation.en: Teddy, I'm gonna need your knife.
Uh, Santa, that's not how you work the radio.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞老人 收音机不是那么用的

translation.en: on the corner of Naperville and Roslyn. Car 476 responding.
translation.zh:
‎地点是内珀维尔和罗斯林街的街角
‎第476号车正在前往

translation.en: -How did you just-- -I am the greatest toymaker on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么会弄… ‎我可是地球上最会制作玩具的人

translation.en: [man on radio] All units, we have a reported grand theft auto.
translation.zh: ‎各组注意 我们收到了偷车举报

translation.en: A 2014 red Dodge Challenger, license plate six, Bravo, Lima, seven, two, four.
translation.zh:
‎一辆2014年版的红色道奇挑战者
‎车牌号是6BL724

translation.en: Stolen by two kids and an extremely large man.
translation.zh: ‎偷车人是两个小孩和极度肥胖的男人

translation.en: [chuckles] A guy goes to the gym every day,
stays away from sugar and carbs, what difference does it make? Oh man.
translation.zh:
‎不吃甜食和碳水化合物
‎结果有什么用？真是的

translation.en: [man 2 on radio] Attention, we have sightings of what appear to be...
translation.zh: ‎各组注意 有多位市民表示看见了…
‎驯鹿 在密歇根大道上奔驰

translation.en: -Just what we're looking for. -[man 2] Not a joke.
I have a team of reindeer headed southbound on Michigan Avenue,
translation.zh:
‎有一群驯鹿正在密歇根大道上
‎朝水塔方向

translation.en: -That way! Go! -The, uh... The car can't fly, Santa.
translation.zh:
‎-那边！快！
‎-这车不会飞 圣诞老人

translation.en: Right, habit. Okay, left on State, right on Erie, left on Michigan.
translation.zh:
‎对哦 职业病 ‎好吧 在州街左转
‎伊利大道右转 密歇根大道左转

translation.en: How do you know so much about Chicago?
I know every street in the world, kid.
translation.zh: ‎我知道世界上的每一条街道

translation.en: Teddy, you think we could pick it up a little bit?
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 你能稍微开快一点吗？

translation.en: See if we can find my reindeer.
[Kate] You guys! There-- There they are!
Back down that street! Turn around, Teddy! Turn around!
translation.zh: ‎往后边那条街去了 泰迪 掉头！

translation.en: Did I say Dasher? [chuckles] I always forget Vixen. Vixen!
translation.zh:
‎我喊的是猛冲者吗？
‎我总把悍妇给忘了 悍妇！
‎这样 凯特 你来一下

translation.en: -Teddy and I are gonna buy you some time. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-我和泰迪帮你拖延时间
‎-什么？

translation.en: We can't leave my sister all alone out here.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我们不能让我妹妹一个人去

translation.en: -[Teddy] But I think-- -She said she can handle it, Teddy.
translation.zh:
‎-可是…
‎-她说她一个人能搞定 泰迪

translation.en: I've always believed in you, Kate.
translation.zh: ‎我一直以来都相信你 凯特

translation.en: You can do this. Go get 'em.
[Santa] All right, all right. Hey, hey, hey, hey. I'm driving! I'm-- Dude! Out!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 喂 我来开车！我… ‎小子！给我下来！

translation.en: Come on, quick! Here we go!
[Teddy] Oh, my God! It's an automatic!
-I'm a little rusty! Relax! -[Teddy] It's not that complicated!
translation.zh:
‎-我有点手生！放轻松！
‎-没那么复杂！

translation.en: I mean, I'm used to something with more pop under the hood,
translation.zh: ‎我习惯开发动机更强劲的雪橇 不过…

translation.en: but, man, this baby really handles!
I mean, can't you just wave your hand and Jedi mind trick the cops?
translation.zh:
‎你就不能挥挥手
‎用绝地控心术把警察甩掉吗？

translation.en: I'm Santa Claus, Teddy, not Yoda. [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎我是圣诞老人 泰迪 不是尤达大师

translation.en: I won't hurt you. I'm with Santa.
translation.zh:
‎我不会伤害你们
‎是圣诞老人让我来的

translation.en: I'm one of the good guys.
Wow, you're really famous where I come from!
translation.zh: ‎哇 你在我们那儿可有名了

translation.en: Is it okay if I take you to him?
[laughs] Trading in eight reindeer for 400 horses!
-[laughing] -We've been in enough crashes for one night, don't you think?
translation.zh:
‎我们一晚上撞车撞得够多了吧
‎圣诞老人？

translation.en: -Hang on. I think I can lose 'em! -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎别急 我应该可以甩掉他们

translation.en: [panting] Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
If you ever meet Mrs. Claus...
translation.zh: ‎如果你哪天见到了圣诞夫人

translation.en: [man on speaker] Hands outside the vehicle!
translation.zh: ‎举起双手 将其伸出车外

translation.en: -Step out of the car! -You gotta be kidding.
translation.zh:
‎-再慢慢下车！
‎-告诉我这不是真的

translation.en: -Get out of the car! -You heard the man! Get out! Now!
translation.zh:
‎-下车！
‎-你们都听到了 立刻下车！

translation.en: [laughs] Look at the two of you, all grown up!
translation.zh: ‎瞧瞧你俩 都长这么大了 我告诉你

translation.en: Now, they were always good kids. Well, almost--
[Dave] You are under arrest for driving a stolen vehicle!
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 几乎一直都是…
‎-你现在因驾驶赃车被捕

translation.en: Yeah, the car's stolen, but we didn't steal it.
translation.zh: ‎对 这车是被偷了 但不是我们偷的

translation.en: We were just borrowing it before bringing it back to the station.
translation.zh:
‎我们只是在把它交还给警局之前
‎暂时借用

translation.en: That's the first time I heard that one. How about you, Dave?
translation.zh:
‎我还是第一次听这种借口
‎戴夫 你呢？

translation.en: This job's always full of surprises.
translation.zh: ‎干这行 什么新鲜事没遇过

translation.en: I'm not joking! We're gonna return the car, good as new!
translation.zh: ‎我没在开玩笑！ ‎我们会把车修好复原后交给你的

translation.en: Yeah? How you plan on doing that?
translation.zh: ‎这样啊 你打算怎么做啊？

translation.en: Elves? Right. They're good with bodywork?
translation.zh: ‎精灵？ ‎哦 他们擅长修车吗？

translation.en: They build thousands of cars every year.
translation.zh: ‎他们每年都要制造好几千辆车

translation.en: Oh yeah? They work in Detroit?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？他们在汽车城底特律工作吗？

translation.en: [laughs] What was I thinking, Mr... uh... You know what? We never got your name.
translation.zh: ‎还真是失敬了 这位先生… ‎我们还不知道你怎么称呼呢
‎拜托 二位是认真的吗？我…

translation.en: Right, right. Why don't you give us a "Ho ho ho"
translation.zh:
‎是哦 ‎那你给我们来声“吼吼吼”吧
‎算是验明正身

translation.en: -so we really know it's you? -I don't do "Ho ho ho."
translation.zh:
‎那你给我们来声“吼吼吼”吧
‎算是验明正身 ‎我从来不说“吼吼吼”

translation.en: Tell us what you're doing on Christmas Eve borrowing a car.
translation.zh:
‎跟我们说说
‎你在圣诞前夜借车开干什么

‎-哦 圣诞节遇到麻烦了？
‎-大麻烦

translation.en: Speaking of which, it would be great if the two of you could help me
translation.zh: ‎对了 如果你们俩能帮我

translation.en: -track down my reindeer. -[Dave] No can do.
translation.zh:
‎-找到我的驯鹿就再好不过了
‎-办不到

translation.en: -Reindeer fall under Animal Control. -Give 'em a call!
translation.zh:
‎-驯鹿属于动物管制局的范畴
‎-给他们打电话呀！

translation.en: Okay, Santa Claus. That's enough fun for one night.
translation.zh:
‎行了 圣诞老人
‎你今天晚上应该玩够了吧？

translation.en: -Gotta take you to the station. Let's go. -Wait! Look, it wasn't his fault.
translation.zh:
‎你得跟我们回警局了 ‎-行动吧
‎-等等！错不在他

translation.en: This was all me. I took the car.
What's this man's relationship with you, Teddy?
translation.zh: ‎这位男士和你是什么关系 泰迪？

translation.en: my... well, he came down my chimney.
translation.zh: ‎我的… ‎嗯 他从我家烟囱爬进来的

translation.en: [chuckles] No, I-- He's Santa Claus. That's...
translation.zh: ‎不是 我是说 他是圣诞老人 他…

translation.en: I wouldn't have believed him either, but...
translation.zh: ‎要是以前 我也不会相信他 可是…

translation.en: -I mean, I saw the sleigh, the reindeer-- -Where do you live, son?
translation.zh: ‎我看见了雪橇、驯鹿… ‎你家住哪儿 小子？

translation.en: Let me get this straight. You broke into this boy's residence
translation.zh:
‎等等 让我说清楚
‎你非法闯入这个孩子的家

translation.en: -and took him a thousand miles from home? -Wait.
translation.zh: ‎把他带到了几千公里之外的地方？

translation.en: This wasn't my idea! Look, Mikey, Officer Jameson--
translation.zh: ‎我也没想这么做啊！ ‎迈奇 詹姆森警官

translation.en: -Impressive. You can read a name tag. -Unfortunately--
translation.zh:
‎-你会读名牌上的字 真厉害
‎-不幸的是…
‎不幸的是 拯救圣诞节的事

translation.en: -saving Christmas ain't in your cards. -Yeah, well, it's gonna be tight!
translation.zh:
‎不幸的是 拯救圣诞节的事 ‎-你想都别想
‎-我知道时间很紧迫！
‎别磨蹭了 跟我们走一趟
‎来人啊！救救我！我快掉下去了！

translation.en: All right, Kate. Slow down. Slow down, Kate!
Whoa! Slow your roll. Get back here.
translation.zh: ‎你也别激动 过来站好 圣诞老人

translation.en: Find my sack of toys. It'll lead you to the elves.
translation.zh: ‎去找我的玩具袋 然后就能找到精灵

translation.en: [Dave] Hey! Mikey, get the kid! I'm putting this guy in the car!
translation.zh: ‎喂！别让那小子跑了！ ‎我先把这家伙押进车上

translation.en: -They need to get up. -[Dave] Come on!

translation.zh:
‎-把彗星的铃铛系上！
‎-你给我回来！

translation.en: -What did he say? -All I heard was "jingle bells."
Fly for me! You can do it!
-[man] What am I looking at? -[indistinct radio chatter]

translation.zh: ‎你没能追上他们真遗憾 戴夫

translation.en: I can't believe it! We're flying!
translation.zh: ‎这太不可思议了！我们在天上飞！

translation.en: I'm on Donner. What about you?
-That means we're close! -[Kate] Where do you think it is?
translation.zh: ‎这意味着我们离它很近了 ‎你觉得它会在哪儿？

translation.en: Let's land. It'll be easier to find from the ground.
translation.zh: ‎我们降落吧 在地面上要更好找一些

translation.en: -Hang tight and blend in! -Come on! Let's go, let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-在这儿等我们 好好和睦相处
‎-快点！我们走！

translation.en: You think it's inside the church?
-It's gotta be around here somewhere. -[Kate] Yeah...
translation.zh:
‎-应该就在附近的某个地方
‎-是啊

translation.en: He sang it every Christmas Eve. [sniffles]
You know, I haven't been to church since he...
translation.zh: ‎我很久没去过教堂了 自从他…

translation.en: Would it kill you to leave me alone for one minute?
He would be so disappointed in me.
translation.zh: ‎他要是见到现在的我 会失望透顶的

translation.en: That's because she knows, deep down,
translation.zh: ‎那是因为她知道 在你的外表之下

translation.en: you're not such a total screw-up.
Thanks. You're, uh... You're making me feel great.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你呀 这话让我好过多了

translation.en: I know I've been an awful brother, it's just...
translation.zh:
‎我知道我这个哥哥当得很糟糕
‎我只是…

translation.en: I've been so mad at him.
I mean, he spent years helping other people, but where is he now?
translation.zh:
‎他这么多年来一直帮助他人
‎结果他现在人呢？

translation.en: Why did he have to go into that stupid fire?
translation.zh: ‎他为什么要闯入那个该死的火场？

translation.en: [voice shaking] He had a wife... and two kids, and he gave it all up...
translation.zh: ‎他有妻子 ‎有两个孩子 他丢下我们仨

translation.en: just to save some random strangers.
translation.zh: ‎而跑去救几个素味平生的陌生人

translation.en: And now, I'd give anything just to tell him...
translation.zh: ‎我愿意付出任何代价 只要能告诉他…

translation.en: Teddy, you aren't such an awful brother.
translation.zh: ‎泰迪 你并不是个糟糕的哥哥

translation.en: Dad wouldn't be disappointed in you.
Because I see him all the time...
translation.zh: ‎因为我每时每刻都能看见他

translation.en: You're just saying that 'cause you wanna save Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎你是因为想拯救圣诞才这么说的

translation.en: You just gotta believe it, too.
Why must they keep drawing me like that?
translation.zh: ‎我为什么总被画成那副模样？

translation.en: I mean, does my butt really look that big to you?
Now, sit down or I'll cuff you to the desk.
translation.zh: ‎快点坐下 不然我把你铐在桌子上

translation.en: Listen, pal. You can lose the shtick.
translation.zh: ‎好了 伙计 你就别再演了

translation.en: I've had a long day, so just tell me your name, and I don't wanna hear Santa Claus.
translation.zh:
‎我今天很累了 你就告诉我你的名字
‎我不想听到“圣诞老人”
‎这个我可以办到 我的正式全名

translation.en: it's Saint Nicholas. I prefer Saint Nick.
translation.zh: ‎是圣尼古拉斯 我更倾向于圣尼克

translation.en: And I'm actually... I'm not officially an official saint.
translation.zh:
‎不过实际上
‎我没有被官方认证为圣人

translation.en: I mean, they haven't bestowed that title upon me officially, so...
translation.zh:
‎他们还没有正式授予我这个名号
‎所以…

translation.en: -I guess it's who you know. -[Dave] Buddy,
I'm about at the end of my rope here.
translation.zh: ‎我的耐心已经被消磨殆尽了

translation.en: So, what? Did you rob a toy store, too?
translation.zh: ‎所以你还抢劫了一家玩具店吗？

translation.en: So, what is all this stuff?
You honestly don't remember, do you?
These are all the things you ever dreamed of when you were a kid.
translation.zh: ‎这些都是你小时候梦想得到的东西

translation.en: Everything you ever really wanted for Christmas.
Starting from the age of six.
Mm. Now, you interrupted me at age nine.
translation.zh: ‎我正要说你九岁的愿望 被你打断了

translation.en: -Should I continue? -[Dave] No. No, that-- that's enough.
translation.zh:
‎-我应该继续吗？
‎-不必了 ‎不用了 够了

translation.en: Good, let's just fast-forward to this year.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那我们就直接跳到今年吧

translation.en: You know what I want for Christmas?
-How did you-- -She left you a couple years ago,
translation.zh:
‎-你是怎么…
‎-她在几年前离你而去

translation.en: and all you want for Christmas is for her to come back.
translation.zh: ‎你最大的圣诞愿望就是与她破镜重圆

translation.en: -Yeah, well, that ain't ever gonna happen. -Yeah, I think maybe.
translation.zh: ‎就算是吧 但那是不可能的 ‎我觉得…也许吧

translation.en: Okay, look, pal. You don't walk in here and talk about my ex-wife.
translation.zh:
‎行了 伙计
‎我不许你谈论我前妻的事！

translation.en: Dave, just-- just give her a call.
translation.zh: ‎戴夫 你给她打个电话吧

translation.en: -She doesn't wanna talk to me. -Yes! Yes, she does!
translation.zh:
‎-她不想和我说话
‎-她想的！真的！

translation.en: Now, she's-- she's having second thoughts and...
[laughs] Now I know you're out of your tree.
I mean, you've always been a suspicious, doubtful type.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你一直是那种
‎不轻信、易怀疑的人

translation.en: That's probably why you're a good cop.
translation.zh: ‎也许这正是你适合当警察的原因

translation.en: But deep down, you know that I know what everybody wants for Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎但是在你内心深处
‎你知道我知道所有人的圣诞愿望

translation.en: So, just give her a call, Dave!
translation.zh: ‎所以你就给她打个电话吧 戴夫！

translation.en: I don't know how you know all this stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你是怎么知道这些事的

translation.en: I don't know where the reindeer came from.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道那些驯鹿是哪儿来的

translation.en: I don't know where they went, but I know what the reality is.
translation.zh: ‎不知道它们去哪儿了 ‎但我知道现实的真相

translation.en: You evaded a police officer, not to mention child endangerment
translation.zh: ‎你逃避警方追捕 ‎还危害儿童安全 涉嫌绑架！
‎还危害儿童安全 涉嫌绑架！
‎你知道什么事情很严重吗 戴夫？

translation.en: Christmas spirit is already down to 31%.
The longer I stay in here, the lower it's gonna go,
translation.zh: ‎我在这里待得越久 数值就会越低

translation.en: and the lower it goes means people are gonna start acting cranky.
translation.zh:
‎随着数值降低
‎人们就会开始变得暴躁

translation.en: And that's when bad things start to happen,
More than you've seen here in a long time, and we're in Chicago, for goodness' sake!
translation.zh:
‎比你历年来在这里见过的还多 ‎而且这里是
‎犯罪率本来就很高的芝加哥啊！

translation.en: Oh, I expect this station will be bursting at the seams come morning.
translation.zh:
‎对了 到了明天早上
‎这个警局肯定会被挤爆的

translation.en: But there is a bright spot, Dave.
translation.zh: ‎但我们并不是完全没有希望 戴夫

translation.en: There's still time for you to make it right.
I knew, given enough evidence, that eventually you'd come around.
translation.zh:
‎我就知道只要给出足够的证据
‎你一定会回心转意的

translation.en: I don't know if you're some kind of Las Vegas magician
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你是什么
‎拉斯维加斯的魔术师

translation.en: or a freak who hacks into people's personal lives on the Internet.
translation.zh:
‎还是在网上
‎盗取他人私生活信息的变态

translation.en: Either way, hope you didn't make plans for New Year's.
translation.zh: ‎不管怎样 我希望你没有新年计划

translation.en: You're gonna be here a while.
translation.zh: ‎因为你要在这里待上一阵子了

translation.en: -[Kate] We're really close! -[Teddy] It's gotta be here!
translation.zh: ‎我们离得很近了！ ‎肯定就是这里了！

translation.en: Now we just need to get back to Santa. [gasps]
translation.zh: ‎现在我们只要回去找圣诞老人就好了

translation.en: We're with Santa and we need your help!
translation.zh: ‎是圣诞老人让我们来的 ‎我们需要你们的帮助！

translation.en: Well, that ain't what it sounded like.
If it's okay with you, I'll just be on my way.
translation.zh: ‎如果没事的话 我就先告辞了

translation.en: Why are we even bothering with this fool?
translation.zh:
‎行了 我们干嘛费劲
‎跟这蠢蛋过不去呢？

translation.en: You think you're a tough guy?
What can possibly be in that bag...
translation.zh: ‎那袋子里到底有什么值钱东西

translation.en: that could be worth what's about to happen to you?

translation.zh: ‎泰迪 这里面太不可思议了！

translation.en: I think I'm in the North Pole. [chuckles softly]
[Kate] I know I haven't been doing too well in school,
especially since I got a D minus in Spanish.
Dear Santa, This year we would like a pony for Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的圣诞老人 今年的圣诞节
‎我们想要一匹小马驹

translation.en: But Mom says the house is too small, so maybe just a puppy.
translation.zh:
‎但妈妈说我们家太小了
‎所以小狗或许要现实一点

translation.en: [girl] And a really cool pair of awesome sunglasses.
translation.zh: ‎一副特别酷特别炫的太阳眼镜

translation.en: I'm Bing Bellamy, and all I want for Christmas is a snowboard!
translation.zh:
‎我叫宾贝拉米 我最大的圣诞愿望
‎就是一个滑雪板
‎泰迪今年有给圣诞老人写信？
‎“亲爱的圣诞老人 我是泰迪皮尔斯

translation.en: I haven't written to you in a long time.
translation.zh: ‎我有很长一段时间没有写信给你了

translation.en: once you get older, the whole Christmas thing seems pretty lame.
translation.zh:
‎随着年龄的增长
‎圣诞节什么的也越来越没意思

translation.en: This year, I have a special request.
I'd really like to see my dad again.
translation.zh: ‎我真的想要再见我爸爸一面

translation.en: I'm not even sure if it's something you can do.
translation.zh: ‎我都不确定你是不是能够达成这种事

translation.en: But I really need to tell him that--"
-[Elves speaking Elvish] -[Kate] Guys! Let me go!
What are you doing with my camera?
-Give it back! You're gonna break it. -[elf speaking Elvish]
[Kate] Hey, let me go! Guys, let me go!
translation.zh: ‎喂 放开我！你们快放开我！

translation.en: Hey, come on, let me out!
Let me out of here! Let me out of here!
[in English] Let me explain what happened!
translation.zh: ‎请听我解释一下事情的经过！

translation.en: You see, after the sleigh crashed, -we lost the reindeer. -[elves gasp]
translation.zh: ‎雪橇撞到地面之后 驯鹿跑丢了

translation.en: -[in Elvish] You lost the reindeer? -[crying] Blitzen!
[in English] Santa Claus told me to find you guys!
He said you guys were the only ones who would know what to do!
translation.zh:
‎他说你们是唯一知道
‎下一步该怎么做的人
‎他说我们必须将圣诞节进行到底！

translation.en: But, wow! I come from a long line -of True Believers! -[gasps]
translation.zh:
‎天啊！我家对圣诞节的信仰
‎原来是代代相传的！

translation.en: [in Elvish] She is a True Believer!
[in English] And then the reindeer just... Boom! They just flew away!
translation.zh: ‎那些驯鹿就嗖地一下就飞走了！

translation.en: Oh, you're gonna walk away from me? Huh?
I saw a bunch of reindeer fly into the night sky!
-I am not crazy! -[man] Yes, you are.
Man, have you ever seen anything like this?
translation.zh: ‎哥们儿 你见过这副场面吗？

translation.en: I've never seen it this busy on Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: ‎警局从来没在圣诞前夜这么忙过

translation.en: The least you could do is play some Christmas music.

translation.zh:
‎-圣诞老人 你说是吧？
‎-我同意

translation.en: Oh, brother, the mood in this place is really bringing Christmas spirit down,
translation.zh:
‎哎 这个地方的气氛让圣诞精神
‎变得多低迷啊

translation.en: Whoa! Christmas spirit is down to 19%?
If I don't do something quick, this night's over.
translation.zh:
‎要是我再不马上有所行动
‎今晚就完了

translation.en: Do you remember what you got for Christmas in 1971?
translation.zh: ‎你们还记得你们在1971年 ‎得到的圣诞礼物是什么吗？

translation.en: I got the super fly Sunburst Epiphone Casino, man!
translation.zh:
‎我得到的是超酷炫的
‎森伯斯特依普风卡奇诺吉他
‎我的是格雷奇周年纪念双色吉他

translation.en: In, uh... In the pawn shop.
'Cause you two guys were really good.
Unfortunately, some other habits took precedence, you dig?
translation.zh:
‎不幸的是 有些别的嗜好占了上风
‎懂不？

translation.en: and that means there's magic in the air!
translation.zh: ‎这意味着一切都充满着魔法

translation.en: -What am I supposed to do with this, man? -Play it.
translation.zh:
‎-你给我这个干什么 伙计？
‎-演奏啊

translation.en: -[laughs] I can't play this thing! -Are you sure?

translation.zh: ‎嘿 圣诞季已经来临 漂亮宝贝

translation.en: ♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -[women] ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪ -[plays guitar solo]

translation.zh: ‎没错 圣诞季已经来临 漂亮宝贝

translation.en: -♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -[women] ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Well, you've been A real good little girl ♪
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小姑娘 你表现得真棒

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town ♪
♪ You gonna see me coming In a big black Cadillac! ♪
translation.zh:
‎我会驾着一辆黑色的凯迪拉克
‎重磅回归！
‎噢 圣诞季已经来临 漂亮宝贝

translation.en: -♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Well, you've been A real good little baby ♪
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小姑娘 你表现得真棒

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town ♪
♪ Christmas ♪ Is there a piano in this joint?
Well, Christmas came early this year, huh?
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节还没到 礼物就先到了 是吧？

translation.en: Is this some kind of a joke?
Next time you morons waste my time...
translation.zh:
‎你们这些蠢货下次要再敢
‎浪费我的时间…

translation.en: No! No, my sister's in there!
Look, I know it sounds crazy, but please don't do that!
translation.zh:
‎我知道这听起来很离谱
‎但求你住手！
‎求你了 伙计 求你了！

translation.en: -Let me go, and nobody gets hurt! -[grunts]
Take care of him! -Put him in the dumpsters out back! -[grunts]
translation.zh:
‎把他解决了
‎然后扔在后面的大垃圾桶里

translation.en: Hey, he's-- he's actually kinda cute.
Hey, little guy! What's your name?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小家伙 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: [in Elvish] Time to take out the trash.
[man, in English] Let's get outta here!
[sighs, in Elvish] Wait. We missed one.
Wait! I'm one of the good guys!
[in Elvish] I never have any fun.
-[Teddy, in English] Kate, are you okay? -Better than okay!
translation.zh:
‎-凯特 你还好吗？
‎-好得不得了

translation.en: -I can-- I see that. -[elf] Ow, ow!
-Let's get the reindeer and the sleigh. -The sleigh's busted.
translation.zh:
‎-好 我们去找驯鹿和雪橇！
‎-雪橇坏掉了！

translation.en: [in English] Cool! Now we just need to find Santa!
translation.zh:
‎棒极了！
‎现在我们只需要找到圣诞老人了

translation.en: You guys know where he is?
-[elves chattering] -Poor Santa. I'll bet he's freaking out.
translation.zh: ‎可怜的圣诞老人 他一定吓坏了

translation.en: ♪ Santa Claus is comin' Down your chimney tonight! ♪
translation.zh: ‎圣诞老人今晚会从烟囱爬进来！
‎噢 圣诞季已经来临 漂亮宝贝

translation.en: Down your chimney! ♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪
translation.zh:
‎-从烟囱爬进来！
‎-漫天飞雪落满地

translation.en: ♪ Well, you've been A real good little baby ♪
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小宝贝 你表现得真棒

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town ♪
♪ Well, you've been A real good little baby ♪
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小宝贝 你表现得真棒

translation.en: -♪ 'Cause Santa Claus is back in town! ♪ -[whoops]
And the reindeer just... flew away!
Not too bad for our first gig, huh?
translation.zh: ‎第一场演出就这么成功 不赖吧？

translation.en: I have seen a lot of strange things in my time, but this...
translation.zh: ‎我这辈子见过很多奇闻怪事 但这个…

translation.en: this takes it to a whole other level.
translation.zh: ‎这个完全是另外一个级别的诡异

translation.en: Oh, wait till you see what happens next.
translation.zh: ‎哦 那接下来你更会大开眼界

translation.en: Okay, I want answers. Real answers, right now.
translation.zh: ‎好了 你就回答我吧 好好地回答我！

translation.en: So first, why don't you answer that?
She invited me out for coffee this morning.
Well, that's, uh... That's my little buddy Hugg.
translation.zh:
‎-这怎么回…
‎-那是我的小兄弟赫格

translation.en: He's, uh... bringing me a present.
Mrs. Claus told you to take a spare.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞夫人都说了让你带个备用帽

translation.en: [in English] Well, guys. It's been great jamming with you.
translation.zh:
‎好了 各位
‎刚才与你们奏乐欢唱很是开心

‎-女士们 再会了
‎-圣诞老人再见

translation.en: -[man 3] All right, man! -[man 4] Yeah! That's cool, man!
translation.zh:
‎-太棒了 伙计！
‎-耶！太酷了 兄弟！

translation.en: -[man 1] I don't know, man. -[man 2] We'll try. We'll try.
We can keep these, right, Santa?
translation.zh: ‎这吉他不用还给你吧 圣诞老人？

translation.en: -You busted outta jail! -First time for everything, Katie Cat!
translation.zh:
‎-你居然越狱了！
‎-凡事都有第一次嘛 凯特猫

translation.en: [in English] Let's go to work. Whoa! No, no, no, no, no, no!
I lost all track of time.
[sighs] We've only got less than an hour before the sun rises.
translation.zh: ‎还剩不到一个小时就要日出了

translation.en: But... we can still save Christmas, right?
translation.zh: ‎我们还是能拯救圣诞节的 对吧？

translation.en: We're at the end of my window, Kate.
translation.zh: ‎日出之后我就没有机会了 凯特

translation.en: Well... I mean, there's gotta be something we can do.
But that can't be! There can't be Christmas without presents!
translation.zh: ‎这样不行！圣诞节不能没有礼物！

translation.en: We started something last night, and we're gonna finish it.
translation.zh:
‎既然我们昨天晚上开始拯救圣诞
‎就要有始有终

translation.en: Now, I don't know how you guys do things in the North Pole, but...
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你们在北极的
‎工作信条是什么 但是…

translation.en: a Pierce always sees it through.
translation.zh: ‎皮尔斯家的人总是坚持到底
‎我很钦佩你的热情 泰迪

translation.en: But I haven't cut it this close in, I don't know, maybe ever.
translation.zh: ‎我的时间从来没有这么紧迫过

translation.en: I-- I just don't see how it's possible.
translation.zh: ‎我就是看不到任何的可能性

translation.en: You do the entire world in one night all by yourself!
translation.zh:
‎你一个人只用一晚上的时间
‎就能在全世界派送礼物

translation.en: I mean, imagine what we could cover if we all work together!
translation.zh:
‎那你想想 如果我们齐心协力
‎效率会多高！

translation.en: Just think of us as Santa's helpers!
translation.zh: ‎你就把我们当成圣诞老人的小帮手吧

translation.en: Well, I've never had human helpers in the sleigh before...
translation.zh: ‎我从来没有用雪橇载过人类小帮手

translation.en: some way we could work together to...
translation.zh: ‎什么办法能让我们团结协作

translation.en: We've only got a little bit of North America left.
translation.zh: ‎我们只差北美洲的一些地方了

translation.en: If I didn't have to carry my sack, I could move twice as fast!
translation.zh:
‎如果不背着玩具袋的话
‎我可以提速两倍！

translation.en: All right, this just might work!
Now, Kate, you're in charge of getting all the presents ready to go!
translation.zh: ‎凯特 你负责把所有礼物提前找出来

translation.en: You just call out the addresses and the names,
and you throw 'em outta the sack.
Just chuck 'em out. I'll catch 'em, and I'll deliver!
translation.zh: ‎随便丢就行 我会接住并派送它们

translation.en: And that means, Teddy, you drive!
translation.zh: ‎那么泰迪 你来负责驾驶！

translation.en: [stammers] You-- You want me to drive... that?

translation.zh: ‎哦 我可是见识过你的车技的

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, a car. But, I mean, this is... This is...
translation.zh: ‎但那是汽车啊 可是这个…

translation.en: Now where is all that huff and puff about "A Pierce always sees it through"?
translation.zh:
‎你刚不还煞有介事地说
‎“皮尔斯家的人总是坚持到底”吗？

translation.en: That was before you told me I was gonna have to drive!
translation.zh:
‎可是那时候
‎我还不知道你会让我来驾驶雪橇！

translation.en: Well, this is the only way we're gonna make it,
so I guess it's gonna be baptism by fire!
Well, maybe I can help Kate with presents, right?
translation.zh:
‎我或许可以
‎帮凯特一起整理礼物 对吧？

translation.en: I told you, we're gonna have to move fast!
Come on! Hop in the back!
All right, you gotta hold them.
Now we're gonna see what you're made of!
Now, just think about where you wanna go...
translation.zh: ‎你现在只要想想你要去的地方

translation.en: Oh no, no, no, no! Santa, I can't do this!
translation.zh: ‎不行啊 圣诞老人 我做不到！

translation.en: Some things we gotta figure out on our own, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎有些事情就是得靠自己摸索 泰迪

translation.en: All right, here's the book with all the names and addresses.
translation.zh:
‎看好了 ‎（乖孩子） ‎这个本子上
‎有所有人的名字和地址

translation.en: [Santa exclaims] Don't be afraid! Don't be afraid.
If there's one thing reindeer can smell, it's fear!
translation.zh: ‎驯鹿对恐惧的嗅觉最是敏感！

translation.en: [Teddy] I can't control them! [grunts] Santa, this isn't funny!
translation.zh: ‎我控制不了它们！ ‎圣诞老人 别开玩笑了！

translation.en: Eight reindeer! How tough can it be?!
translation.zh: ‎就八头驯鹿而已 能有多难？
‎见识到我的厉害了吧 死胖子！

translation.en: -[rails screeching] -They won't go up! What do I need to do?
translation.zh: ‎它们就是不飞起来！我该怎么办？

translation.en: You've always just had to do one thing, Teddy.
translation.zh: ‎你需要做的从来都只有一件事 泰迪

translation.en: -But I do believe in you! -No, no, no! I'm not talking about me.
translation.zh:
‎-我是相信你啊！
‎-不 我说的不是我

translation.en: You have to believe in yourself.
The way your mother believes in you.
The way your father believed in you.
translation.zh: ‎就像你爸爸生前相信你一样
‎你是皮尔斯家的人 泰迪！

translation.en: And a Pierce... -Always sees it through! -Yeah! [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-皮尔斯家的人…
‎-总是坚持到底！

translation.en: On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer! On, Vixen! On, Comet! On, Cupid! On, Donner! On, Blitzen!
translation.zh:
‎猛冲者加油！闪电加油！欢腾加油！
‎悍妇加油！彗星加油！

translation.en: [Santa] All right, guys! This is it! Last city!
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 就是这里了 ‎最后一站！

translation.en: -[in Elvish] Reporting for duty! -[all] Reporting for duty!
translation.zh:
‎-报到 请指示！
‎-报到 请指示！
‎杰西卡马丁 富兰克林大道8470号

translation.en: Ray, Scarlett, and Brooke Stuber, 3947 Jackson Street!
translation.zh:
‎雷、斯佳丽和布鲁克斯斯图伯
‎杰克逊街3947号
‎西拉沃德尔萨克 伍德街341号
‎詹妮弗莱斯比伦蒂 比奇伍德街852号

translation.en: [in Elvish] Hunter and Connor Morris. They live on 4433 Pacific Avenue!
translation.zh: ‎亨特和康纳莫里斯… ‎他们住在太平洋大道4433号！

translation.en: [in English] Hey, Santa! I just spoke Elvish!
translation.zh: ‎圣诞老人！我刚才会说精灵语了！

translation.en: -[watch ticking and chiming] -[in English] We did it!
His list. He's checking it twice.
[in Elvish] I told you, no food or drinks in the sleigh!
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说过
‎不要在我的雪橇上吃喝东西！

translation.en: I just love my candy canes.
translation.zh: ‎我实在是太喜欢吃拐杖糖了

translation.en: -[Kate, in English] What's wrong? -We missed one!
translation.zh: ‎（艾丽西亚桑切斯） ‎出什么问题了？ ‎我们漏掉了一个

translation.en: Sanchez family, Mexico City! We got exactly nine seconds!
translation.zh:
‎墨西哥城的桑切斯一家
‎我们还剩九秒！

translation.en: Teddy, want me to take the reins?
Yah! On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer!
translation.zh:
‎猛冲者加油！跳舞者加油！
‎欢腾加油！

translation.en: -There's no chimney! -Well, sometimes you gotta improvise!
translation.zh:
‎-没有烟囱！
‎-有时候你必须随机应变！

translation.en: -You did it! -[laughs] No! We did it!
translation.zh: ‎你做到了！ ‎不 是我们做到了！

translation.en: All the presents delivered in record time, and Christmas spirit is up to 95%.
translation.zh:
‎礼物以史上最快的速度全数送达
‎圣诞精神值也飙升到了95%

translation.en: Hey, hey! We gotta get back to your house before your mom does!
translation.zh:
‎嘿！我们得在你们的妈妈
‎回家之前赶回去

translation.en: -I think I kinda like sitting over here. -[chuckles]
On, Dasher! On, Dancer! On, Prancer! On, Vixen! On, Comet! On, Cupid!
translation.zh:
‎猛冲者加油！跳舞者加油！
‎欢腾加油…

translation.en: -[Santa] All right, now ease them down. -[reindeer bellowing]
Ease them down, that's it. Easy.
translation.zh: ‎慢慢减速 很好 慢慢来

translation.en: [laughs] Perfect four-point landing! And we beat your mom home, too!
translation.zh:
‎降得非常稳 好极了！
‎我们也赶在你们妈妈之前到家了

translation.en: -What was your favorite part? -Easy! Riding the reindeer!
translation.zh:
‎-你最喜欢哪个部分？
‎-这还用问？当然是骑驯鹿啰！

translation.en: -[Kate] Being in the North Pole! -The car chase with the cops!
Hey, that was the best night of my whole life! Mine, too.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我这辈子最美妙的夜晚
‎-我也这么觉得

translation.en: Oh, Christmas Eve is always the best night of my life.
translation.zh:
‎哦 圣诞前夜永远都是
‎我一生中最美妙的夜晚

translation.en: But now, it's time for me to go home.
Will we ever see you again?
Uh-uh. Not if I can help it.
if I ever need two helpers...
I know where to find the best I've ever had.
translation.zh:
‎我知道在哪里去找
‎我最得力的两位小帮手

translation.en: He said the best human helpers he's ever had.
translation.zh: ‎他说我们是他最得力的人类小帮手

translation.en: [chuckles] I expect to see your Spanish grades go up this year.
translation.zh: ‎今年你的西班牙语成绩应该能有进步

translation.en: Now that you've learned another language.
translation.zh: ‎你已经又学会了一门语言了

translation.en: -What? -[Kate] We forgot to get Mom a present.
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？ ‎我们忘给妈妈准备礼物了

translation.en: Oh, that reminds me, though. [sighs] Uh...
Something I want you to have.
But... won't you need it to fly?
translation.zh: ‎可是没有它你不是飞不起来吗？
‎等等 那… ‎这一整晚 只要你想飞 你随时可以…
‎这一整晚 只要你想飞 你随时可以…

translation.en: All right, now, I don't want any more people to see me, so...
translation.zh:
‎好了 我不想再让更多人看到我
‎所以…

translation.en: -Yup, and I've got it all on... -[camcorder beeping]
[laughs] Did you really think he was gonna let us keep it?
translation.zh: ‎你真以为他会让我们录影存证吗？

translation.en: what if I forget everything that happened tonight?
translation.zh:
‎要是我把今晚发生的事
‎忘得一干二净了呢？

translation.en: Come on! I won't let you forget anything about tonight...
translation.zh:
‎拜托 我不会让你忘记
‎今晚任何一个细节的

translation.en: What are you guys doing out here?
It was a-- a gift from a friend.
We should go inside. It's freezing out here.
translation.zh: ‎我们进屋吧 外边太冷了

translation.en: -[sighs] So, how was your night? -[Teddy] You'll never believe it.
translation.zh:
‎-所以 你们昨晚过得怎样？
‎-你会觉得不可思议的

translation.en: Well, what did you guys do all ni--
This is exactly the way Dad used to...
translation.zh: ‎这和你们爸爸生前布置的一模一样

translation.en: This is the best Christmas present ever.
translation.zh: ‎这是我收到过的最棒的圣诞礼物

translation.en: Look, there's presents. Go open some presents. [sniffles]
translation.zh: ‎快看 有礼物 快去拆礼物吧

translation.en: -[Teddy] Oh, this is yours. -[Kate] This is yours.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 这些是你的
‎-这个是给你的

translation.en: Aunt Peggy sure outdid herself this year.
translation.zh: ‎佩吉姨妈的搞怪毛衣丑出新高度了

translation.en: I was kinda worried you weren't going to make the cut this year.
translation.zh:
‎我本来还有点担心
‎你今年当不了乖孩子了

translation.en: Yeah. Guess I kinda worked it out in the final hour.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 看来我在最后一刻
‎挣了点表现分

‎-和你想要的完全一样吗？
‎-是的！

translation.en: Yeah, I did. [chuckles] Figured I'd cover all the bases.
translation.zh: ‎对啊… ‎我给他写了信 ‎我想说各种渠道都试试看嘛
‎“亲爱的泰迪 ‎我收到了你的信

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't really have the power to grant your wish.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉 ‎我实在没有能力达成你的愿望

translation.en: This was the best I could do.
translation.zh: ‎我能为你做的就只有这么多了

translation.en: There's a perfect spot for it on the tree.
-So, you're gonna wear a helmet with this? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你玩这个的时候会戴头盔吗？
‎-会
‎嘿 圣诞季已经来临 漂亮宝贝

translation.en: -♪ And the snow is fallin' on the ground ♪ -[door opens]
-♪ It's Christmas time, pretty baby ♪ -[woman sighs] So...
translation.zh: ‎圣诞季已经来临 漂亮宝贝 ‎那个…

translation.en: [in Elvish] Sounds like you had quite the night.
translation.zh: ‎我听说你昨晚的经历很是精彩呢

translation.en: It was a bit more hectic than usual...
[in English] But, I did get to speak a lot of English last night!
translation.zh: ‎不过！我昨晚有很多说英语的机会呢

translation.en: [woman] Something about a... car chase and a... jailbreak?
translation.zh: ‎说是有场追车战 还有越狱？

translation.en: Oh, you know how the elves exaggerate. They get excited at the drop of a hat.
translation.zh:
‎哦 你知道精灵们说话很夸张的
‎一丁点的事情都让他们兴奋不已
‎你把帽子丢了也是一丁点的事吗？

translation.en: Were you just a little bit naughty last night?
translation.zh: ‎你昨晚有点调皮捣蛋 是吧？

translation.en: Mm, I... In a nice way.
[Mrs. Claus] Do you want to watch a movie?
I had something else in mind.
